mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_MATERIAL

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD= 'A401' AND SCD != 'MCD' ) A WHERE ATTR3 = ( SELECT TOP 1 ATTR3 FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD= 'A401' AND SCD != 'MCD' ) A ORDER BY ABS(CAST(ATTR3 AS decimal(20,10)) - COALESCE(#{RPM_MAX},0)) )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD= 'A501' AND SCD != 'MCD' ) A WHERE ATTR3 = ( SELECT TOP 1 ATTR3 FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD= 'A501' AND SCD != 'MCD' ) A ORDER BY ABS(CAST(ATTR3 AS decimal(20,10)) - COALESCE(#{SEAL_SIZE},0)) )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD= 'A601' AND SCD != 'MCD' ) A WHERE ATTR3 = ( SELECT TOP 1 ATTR3 FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD= 'A601' AND SCD != 'MCD' ) A ORDER BY ABS(CAST(ATTR3 AS decimal(20,10)) - COALESCE(#{SEAL_SIZE},0)) )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD= 'A701' AND SCD != 'MCD' ) A WHERE ATTR3 = ( SELECT TOP 1 ATTR3 FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD= 'A701' AND SCD != 'MCD' ) A ORDER BY ABS(CAST(ATTR3 AS decimal(20,10)) - COALESCE(#{SEAL_SIZE},0)) )

SELECT * FROM TB_RULE_GRPH_FUNC WHERE MCD= 'A701' AND SCD != 'MCD' ) A WHERE ATTR3 = ( SELECT TOP 1 ATTR3 FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD= 'A701' AND SCD != 'MCD' ) A ORDER BY ABS(CAST(ATTR3 AS decimal(20,10)) - COALESCE(#{SEAL_SIZE},0)) )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD= 'B1901' AND SCD != 'MCD' ) A WHERE 1=1
AND CAST((case when ATTR1='' then '0' WHEN ATTR1 is null then '0' else ATTR1 end) AS decimal(20,10)) <= ceiling(#{H2S_CONT}) AND CAST((case when ATTR2='' then '99999' WHEN ATTR2 is null then '99999' else ATTR2 end) AS decimal(20,10)) >= ceiling(#{H2S_CONT})
ORDER BY ORD

SELECT distinct A.R_NO, A.SEAL_TYPE, A.SEAL_STD_GB, A.SEAL_GB_TYPE, A.RS_GB, A.PV_CURVE, A.RMKS, A.MTRL_CD_M1, A.MTRL_CD_M2, A.MTRL_CD_M3, A.MTRL_CD_M4, B.SEAL_GB FROM TB_RULE_C3 A left Outer Join TB_RULE_C9 B ON A.R_NO=B.R_NO WHERE 1=1
AND A.SEAL_GB_TYPE IN (
#{type}
)
AND A.RS_GB IN (
#{rs}
)
AND A.SEAL_GB_TYPE = #{SEAL_GB_TYPE} AND A.RS_GB = #{RS_GB}
AND #{TEMP_MIN} BETWEEN COALESCE(A.TEMP_MIN,-9999999999) AND COALESCE(A.TEMP_MAX,9999999999) AND #{TEMP_MAX} BETWEEN COALESCE(A.TEMP_MIN,-9999999999) AND COALESCE(A.TEMP_MAX,9999999999) AND #{TEMP_NOR} BETWEEN COALESCE(A.TEMP_MIN,-9999999999) AND COALESCE(A.TEMP_MAX,9999999999)
AND #{SEAL_CHAM_NOR} <= COALESCE(A.PRESS_OUT_D,9999999999) AND #{SEAL_CHAM_MIN} <= COALESCE(A.PRESS_OUT_D,9999999999) AND #{SEAL_CHAM_MAX} <= COALESCE(A.PRESS_OUT_D,9999999999)
AND #{VISC_MIN} BETWEEN ( CASE WHEN A.VISCOSITY_MIN_UNIT = 'CST' THEN COALESCE(A.VISCOSITY_MIN * #{SPEC_GRAVITY_MIN},-9999999999) ELSE COALESCE(A.VISCOSITY_MIN,-9999999999) END ) AND ( CASE WHEN A.VISCOSITY_MAX_UNIT = 'CST' THEN COALESCE(A.VISCOSITY_MAX * #{SPEC_GRAVITY_MAX},9999999999) ELSE COALESCE(A.VISCOSITY_MAX,9999999999) END )
AND #{VISC_MAX} BETWEEN ( CASE WHEN A.VISCOSITY_MIN_UNIT = 'CST' THEN COALESCE(A.VISCOSITY_MIN * #{SPEC_GRAVITY_MIN},-9999999999) ELSE COALESCE(A.VISCOSITY_MIN,-9999999999) END ) AND ( CASE WHEN A.VISCOSITY_MAX_UNIT = 'CST' THEN COALESCE(A.VISCOSITY_MAX * #{SPEC_GRAVITY_MAX},9999999999) ELSE COALESCE(A.VISCOSITY_MAX,9999999999) END )
AND #{VISC_NOR} BETWEEN ( CASE WHEN A.VISCOSITY_MIN_UNIT = 'CST' THEN COALESCE(A.VISCOSITY_MIN * #{SPEC_GRAVITY_MIN},-9999999999) ELSE COALESCE(A.VISCOSITY_MIN,-9999999999) END ) AND ( CASE WHEN A.VISCOSITY_MAX_UNIT = 'CST' THEN COALESCE(A.VISCOSITY_MAX * #{SPEC_GRAVITY_MAX},9999999999) ELSE COALESCE(A.VISCOSITY_MAX,9999999999) END )
AND #{SPEC_GRAVITY_MIN} BETWEEN COALESCE(A.SG_MIN,-9999999999) AND COALESCE(A.SG_MAX,9999999999) AND #{SPEC_GRAVITY_MAX} BETWEEN COALESCE(A.SG_MIN,-9999999999) AND COALESCE(A.SG_MAX,9999999999) AND #{SPEC_GRAVITY_NOR} BETWEEN COALESCE(A.SG_MIN,-9999999999) AND COALESCE(A.SG_MAX,9999999999)
AND #{SHAFT_SIZE} BETWEEN COALESCE(A.SHAFT_SIZE_MIN,-9999999999) AND COALESCE(A.SHAFT_SIZE_MAX,9999999999)
AND #{RPM_MIN} BETWEEN COALESCE(A.SHAFT_SPEED_1_MIN,-9999999999) AND COALESCE(A.SHAFT_SPEED_1_MAX,9999999999) AND #{RPM_MAX} BETWEEN COALESCE(A.SHAFT_SPEED_1_MIN,-9999999999) AND COALESCE(A.SHAFT_SPEED_1_MAX,9999999999) AND #{RPM_NOR} BETWEEN COALESCE(A.SHAFT_SPEED_1_MIN,-9999999999) AND COALESCE(A.SHAFT_SPEED_1_MAX,9999999999)
AND #{L_SPD_MIN} BETWEEN COALESCE(A.SHAFT_SPEED_2_MIN,-9999999999) AND COALESCE(A.SHAFT_SPEED_2_MAX,9999999999) AND #{L_SPD_MAX} BETWEEN COALESCE(A.SHAFT_SPEED_2_MIN,-9999999999) AND COALESCE(A.SHAFT_SPEED_2_MAX,9999999999) AND #{L_SPD_NOR} BETWEEN COALESCE(A.SHAFT_SPEED_2_MIN,-9999999999) AND COALESCE(A.SHAFT_SPEED_2_MAX,9999999999)
AND #{SEAL_SIZE} BETWEEN COALESCE(A.SEAL_SIZE_MIN,-9999999999) AND COALESCE(A.SEAL_SIZE_MAX,9999999999)
AND COALESCE(A.SOLID,0) > 0 AND (#{SOLID_CONT} / 10000) <= COALESCE(A.SOLID,9999999999)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD= 'B301' AND SCD != 'MCD' ) A WHERE 1=1
AND ( (ATTR6='이상' and CAST((case when ATTR8='' then '-99999' WHEN ATTR8 is null then '-99999' else ATTR8 end) as decimal(20,10)) <= #{TEMP_MIN}) or (ATTR6='초과' and CAST((case when ATTR8='' then '-99999' WHEN ATTR8 is null then '-99999' else ATTR8 end) as decimal(20,10)) < #{TEMP_MIN} ) ) AND ( (ATTR7='미만' and CAST((case when ATTR9='' then '99999' WHEN ATTR9 is null then '99999' else ATTR9 end) as decimal(20,10)) > #{TEMP_MAX}) or (ATTR7='이하' and CAST((case when ATTR9='' then '99999' WHEN ATTR9 is null then '99999' else ATTR9 end) as decimal(20,10)) >= #{TEMP_MAX} ) ) AND ( (ATTR10='이상' and CAST((case when ATTR12='' then '0' WHEN ATTR12 is null then '0' else ATTR12 end) as decimal(20,10)) <= #{SEAL_CHAM_MIN}) or (ATTR10='초과' and CAST((case when ATTR12='' then '0' WHEN ATTR12 is null then '0' else ATTR12 end) as decimal(20,10)) < #{SEAL_CHAM_MIN} ) ) AND ( (ATTR11='미만' and CAST((case when ATTR13='' then '99999' WHEN ATTR13 is null then '99999' else ATTR13 end) as decimal(20,10)) > #{SEAL_CHAM_MAX} ) or (ATTR11='이하' and CAST((case when ATTR13='' then '99999' WHEN ATTR13 is null then '99999' else ATTR13 end) as decimal(20,10)) >= #{SEAL_CHAM_MAX} ) ) AND ( CAST((case when ATTR14='' then '0' WHEN ATTR14 is null then '0' else ATTR14 end) as decimal(20,10)) <= #{VAP_PRES_MIN}) AND ( CAST((case when ATTR15='' then '99999' WHEN ATTR15 is null then '99999' else ATTR15 end) as decimal(20,10)) > #{VAP_PRES_MAX})

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD= 'B401' AND SCD != 'MCD' ) A WHERE 1=1
AND CAST((case when ATTR1='' then '-99999' WHEN ATTR1 is null then '-99999' else ATTR1 end) as decimal(20,10)) < CEILING(#{TEMP_MAX}) AND CAST((case when ATTR2='' then '99999' WHEN ATTR2 is null then '99999' else ATTR2 end) as decimal(20,10)) >= CEILING(#{TEMP_MAX})

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD= 'B1801' AND SCD != 'MCD' ) A WHERE 1=1
AND CAST((case when ATTR1='' then '-99999' WHEN ATTR1 is null then '-99999' else ATTR1 end) as decimal(20,10)) <= CEILING(#{TEMP_MIN}) AND CAST((case when ATTR2='' then '99999' WHEN ATTR2 is null then '99999' else ATTR2 end) as decimal(20,10)) >= CEILING(#{TEMP_MAX}) AND ATTR3 = #{EQUIPMENT_TYPE} AND CAST((case when ATTR4='' then '0' WHEN ATTR4 is null then '0' else ATTR4 end) as decimal(20,10)) <= CEILING(#{SEAL_CHAM_MIN}) AND CAST((case when ATTR5='' then '99999' WHEN ATTR5 is null then '99999' else ATTR5 end) as decimal(20,10)) >= CEILING(#{SEAL_CHAM_MAX})

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD= 'B1101' AND SCD != 'MCD' ) A WHERE 1=1
AND CAST((case when ATTR1='' then '-99999' WHEN ATTR1 is null then '-99999' else ATTR1 end) as decimal(20,10)) <= CEILING(#{TEMP_MIN}) AND CAST((case when ATTR2='' then '99999' WHEN ATTR2 is null then '99999' else ATTR2 end) as decimal(20,10)) >= CEILING(#{TEMP_MAX}) AND ATTR3 = #{EQUIPMENT_TYPE} AND CAST((case when ATTR4='' then '0' WHEN ATTR4 is null then '0' else ATTR4 end) as decimal(20,10)) <= CEILING(#{SEAL_CHAM_MIN}) AND CAST((case when ATTR5='' then '99999' WHEN ATTR5 is null then '99999' else ATTR5 end) as decimal(20,10)) >= CEILING(#{SEAL_CHAM_MAX})

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD= 'B11101' AND SCD != 'MCD' AND ATTR2 != 'N' ) A WHERE 1=1
AND CAST((case when ATTR3='' then '0' WHEN ATTR3 is null then '0' else ATTR3 end) AS decimal(20,10)) <= ceiling(COALESCE(#{H2S_CONT},0) ) AND CAST((case when ATTR4='' then '99999' WHEN ATTR4 is null then '99999' else ATTR4 end) AS decimal(20,10)) > ceiling(COALESCE(#{H2S_CONT},0) )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD= 'B11401' AND SCD != 'MCD') A WHERE 1=1
AND ( (ATTR1='이상' and CAST((case when ATTR2='' then '0' WHEN ATTR2 is null then '0' else ATTR2 end) as decimal(20,10)) <= #{WATER_CONT}) or (ATTR1='초과' and CAST((case when ATTR2='' then '0' WHEN ATTR2 is null then '0' else ATTR2 end) as decimal(20,10)) < #{WATER_CONT}) ) AND ( (ATTR3='이하' and CAST((case when ATTR4='' then '99999' WHEN ATTR4 is null then '99999' else ATTR4 end) as decimal(20,10)) >= #{WATER_CONT}) or (ATTR3='미만' and CAST((case when ATTR4='' then '99999' WHEN ATTR4 is null then '99999' else ATTR4 end) as decimal(20,10)) > #{WATER_CONT} ) )
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD= 'C601' AND SCD != 'MCD') A WHERE ATTR1 = #{ATTR1}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD= 'C7801' AND SCD != 'MCD' ) A WHERE 1=1
AND CAST((case when ATTR1='' then '0' WHEN ATTR1 is null then '0' else ATTR1 end) AS decimal(20,10)) < COALESCE(#{H2SO4_CONT},0.0) AND CAST((case when ATTR2='' then '99999' WHEN ATTR2 is null then '99999' else ATTR2 end) AS decimal(20,10)) >= COALESCE(#{H2SO4_CONT},0.0) AND CAST((case when ATTR3='' then '0' WHEN ATTR3 is null then '0' else ATTR3 end) AS decimal(20,10)) <= #{TEMP_MAX} AND CAST((case when ATTR4='' then '99999' WHEN ATTR4 is null then '99999' else ATTR4 end) AS decimal(20,10)) >= #{TEMP_MAX}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_RULE_COM WHERE MCD= 'C7802' AND SCD != 'MCD' ) A WHERE 1=1
AND CAST((case when ATTR1='' then '0' WHEN ATTR1 is null then '0' else ATTR1 end) AS decimal(20,10)) <= COALESCE(#{H2SO4_CONT},0.0) AND CAST((case when ATTR2='' then '99999' WHEN ATTR2 is null then '99999' else ATTR2 end) AS decimal(20,10)) >= COALESCE(#{H2SO4_CONT},0.0) AND CAST((case when ATTR3='' then '0' WHEN ATTR3 is null then '0' else ATTR3 end) AS decimal(20,10)) < #{TEMP_MAX} AND CAST((case when ATTR4='' then '99999' WHEN ATTR4 is null then '99999' else ATTR4 end) AS decimal(20,10)) >= #{TEMP_MAX}
